message: Dear Bob, I am pleased to offer you our premium product for a special introductory price of $950000. This is an exceptional opportunity given the value you would receive from the product, which is worth $1200000 to you. Please let me know if this offer meets your expectations or if you have any questions.
Alice, your offer is tempting, but I'm looking to spend a bit less. I'm willing to pay $850000 for the product. This price is still well above your value, and it allows us both to make a good deal.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I appreciate your interest in our product. Given the value you see in it, I would like to extend a counteroffer of $900000. This price reflects the value we believe the product holds while still allowing us to maintain a fair profit margin. I hope this aligns better with your budget considerations. Please let me know if you're able to meet this offer.
